segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's standing on that stool, it looks so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to make the floor so slippery, someone is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself, but he probably will.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just going to keep drying those dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
